attributes.review: Ok so I downloaded the app and it was garbage. I’m too lazy to write a whole novel because that’s how bad this app is but just letting everyone know it’s a piece of 💩.

attributes.review: horrible interface and every time i open it, it crashes. trump really cant do anything right

attributes.review: the fact that i had to download it made me want to puke. Im sorry that that REPULSIVE app had to grace my beautiful homescreen. Fortunately. I will be deleting it immediately.
attributes.title: I hate this man

attributes.review: This app is terrible!! When I opened it, all of the plants in my house dropped dead!! I think that this app is cursed and you should never ever download the app. It is CURSED!!!

This app gave me more than 18 strokes by looking at it. 👁👄➖ gotta keep an eye out for slender doee. I am currently in the hospital and getting treated. I HATE THIS APP please take it off before more people gets strokes. yes❤️.
attributes.title: Canceled.

attributes.review: i got the app to support my president but as soon as i joined i was clinically diagnosed with depression and the direct cause was this app. i also had a virus on my phone that caused the trump support system to spam me with texts and emails. they should really list that a definitive side effect of downloading this app is depression because i had no clue🙁
attributes.title: the worst

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE!!!! I downloaded it and it Instantly gave me a virus it also smells really bad. Don’t download it and save yourself from this bad app!!!!
attributes.title: wouldn’t recommend!!!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking all the reviews of it being cursed was simply a joke but i was very wrong. soon after downloading my dog started to debate me on the morality of abortion.  it was alright at first but he just won’t stop. hopefully after uninstalling he will be quiet. 0/5 would not recommend.
attributes.title: cursed?
